title: Jenkins and Jonez - Kevin Durant Is Hurt and Magic Johnson Is Tweeting
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - Kevin Durant Is Hurt and Magic Johnson Is Tweeting
description:
The guys discuss how Kevin Durant’s knee injury will affect the Nets, Andrew Wiggins currently being voted an All-Star starter, Magic Johnson tweeting about the Lakers, and why they’re excited to watch ‘The VelociPastor’.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
